item.title: CMSC Resources
item.description: Install Biopython Download and install Python 2.7 Download and install Anaconda Use the following commad to install biopython: conda install -c anaconda biopython=1.68

item.title: CMSC Resources
item.description: Python We will be using Python for all programming projects. Here are some resources to get you started: Short tutorial by Hal Daume Python Tutorial Python Docs Numpy Tutorial (tentative) Numpy User’s Guide Scipy docs IPython docs Jupyter notebooks Other Resources To install Bipython Carl Kingsford’s lecture slides R/Bioconductor: R is an open-source environment for data analysis. The Bioconductor project provides a large number of useful libraries for high-throughput genomic data analysis.
